problem_text_cn: 如图一个扇形铁皮OAB,已知OA=30cm,∠AOB=120°,工人师傅将OA、OB合拢制成了一个圆锥形的烟囱帽(接缝忽略不计),则烟囱帽的底面圆的半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in a sector iron sheet OAB, it is known that OA = N_0, ∠AOB = N_1, the worker master combines OA and OB to form a conical chimney cap (the joints are ignored), then the radius of the bottom circle of the chimney cap is ()
raw_answer: 解:扇形的弧长是:\frac{120π×30}{180}=20πcm,设底面半径是r,则2πr=20π,解得:r=10．故选:C．
